Package org.apache.sling.engine

Interface RequestInfoProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
RequestInfoProviderImpl
@ProviderType public interface RequestInfoProvider
This service can be used to gather information about requests processed by the engine.
Since:
2.5

    • getMayNumberOfInfos

      Get the maximum number of provided infos
      Returns:
      The maximum number, 0 if no infos are recorded
